name: DanceFloor
_source: s;Anuki;Just look at all these cute couples.
s;Simon;Do you want to join them?
s;Anuki;Simon, what do you think our engagement is?
s;Simon;A political alliance between two houses.{w}{br}I have no delusions about that.
s;Simon;But I promise you that none of those couples are as happy as they seem.
s;Simon;So why not join them?{w} Even if our relationship is born of circumstance,{w}{br}why not try to be happy with it?
s;Anuki;I don't believe for a second that I can fool myself into that.{w}{br}Simon, I don't hate you. Or resent you.{w}{br}But I won't pretend to feel something I don't.
s;Simon;I understand.{c:wait;1000} Perhaps we should move on.
